attributes.action: give school burseries to all single parent families on low incomes, even if they claim wtc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being a single parent working part time so that you can keep mortgage going and barely being able to afford school trips, uniform, discos, fayres etc let alone meals.  If you are on a low income and getting wtc you should be able to get help with the cost of school meals, trips etc.  There is no incentive to get single parents back to work and every incentive to not work and scrounge off state.
